name: Mike Brown
title: Gardener, Budtender, Edibles oils maker
coverLetter:
I have been growing for about 20 years, baking for 10 years. I have always done my own genetics and seeds for my the garden. I have always grow outdoors without any chemicals in an all natural all organic setting. I can make coconut oil and olive oil, butter, and other oils for baking. I started Hangtown Edibles 5 years ago, amd was apart of the first Get Baked Sale in San Francisco.

I am willing to relocate in order to have the opportunity to work in the industry in anyway. I would need a place to stay if I relocate until I can find a place to live. As long as I am paid weekly I can buy my own food and get the things I need to live.
experience:
I have been growing and setting up grows for 20 years now along with doing my own genetics and seeds. I am an outdoor all natural all organic gardener from seeds.

Baking for the last 10 years for myself and others. Started Hangtown Edibles 5 years ago to try and help medical marijuana patients with an all natural all organic option for edibles without chemicals. I make marijuana infused coconut oil, olive oil, butter, and other oils for baking and cooking.
additionalInfo:
1. Owner operator of Hangtown Edibles
  • Gardener, Baker, Setting up Grows,
  • Trimming for myself and others
  • Infusing Coconut oil, Olive oil, Avocado oil, Flax Seed oil, and Butter for baking or cooking.
  • I have been doing these things for medical marijuana patients for the last 10 years.
